intro.description:
In this tutorial, you learn how edit the layers of a component. To follow the tutorial, you must have an external editor installed in your computer.
If the views you need to perform this tutorial are not visible, select Window -> Show View and select the view you want.
Follow the tutorial steps in order. After each step, move to the next step by clicking the button located at the bottom of the step: Click to Perform (if you want the step to be performed automatically), Click to Skip (if you want to perform the step manually) or Click to Complete (if no automatisation is available). If you do not use the buttons to move between steps, the automated tutorial functions become inavailable. To start this tutorial, click the Click to Begin button below.

item.title: Create a new theme.
item.description: In the menu bar, select File -> Create New Theme. A New Theme window opens. In the Theme name field, enter Tutorial3. Click Finish. Click Click to Perform to create a new Theme automatically.

item.title: Select the Calendar icon for editing.
item.description: In the Gallery view, select Calendar Month View screen from the drop-down menu. In the Editor, highlight the Calendar icon to display its layers in the Layers view. Click Click to Perform to select the Calendar Icon automatically.

item.title: Edit the Idle Main Area Background layers.
item.description: In the Editor, right-click the Calendar icon's image layer. Select either Convert and edit in Bitmap Editor or Edit image in Vector editor, according to your preferences. Edit and save the layer in the chosen external editor. The Layers view and the Editor now display the changes you made to the layer.

item.title: Save the theme.
item.description: Select File -> Save. Click Click to Perform to save the theme automatically.
